content.html: We've archived the Gorilla Toolkit, a set of Go HTTP libraries & tools originally created back in Oct 2022. We never found a sticky maintainer and/or folks that were consistently contributing. You can read more here: github.com/gorilla#gorill‚Ä¶
content.value:
We've archived the Gorilla Toolkit, a set of Go HTTP libraries & tools originally created back in Oct 2022.

We never found a sticky maintainer and/or folks that were consistently contributing.

You can read more here: github.com/gorilla#gorill‚Ä¶
